docs.snippet: After more than a month of protests and bloody unrest, President Nicolás Maduro has projected an image of openness and inclusion, while simultaneously cracking down....
docs.lead_paragraph: After more than a month of protests and bloody unrest, President Nicolás Maduro has projected an image of openness and inclusion, while simultaneously cracking down.
docs.abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro is projecting an image of openness and inclusion in the face of more than a month of antigovernment protests and bloody unrest, while simultaneously cracking down on demonstrators.

headline.main: In Venezuela, Conciliatory Talk but Combative Tactics
headline.print_headline: In Venezuela, Conciliatory Talk but Combative Tactics
